bike.description: Full high modulus carbon main frame, stays and bell crank, Omniad Elite M30 lay-up, 100mm travel mp4 suspension, Press Fit 30 bottom bracket, 12 x 142 rear thru-axle dropouts, SST size-specific tube diameters, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, asymmetrical chainstays, stainless steel chain stay protector, cartridge bearing pivots, Fox Float CTD Performace Series shock w/ 3-position compression & Boost Valve and 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger, Rock Shox Maxle Lite rear axle

components.description: Fox 32 Float 29 CTD Evolution Series w/ 3-position compression, 15mm axle, tapered alloy steerer, external rebound, 32mm stanchions, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
WTB Frequency Race i19 TCS 29" tubeless rims with Shimano SLX centerlock 15mm front & 12x142 rear hubs, stainless spokes & brass nipples
Shimano XT Shadow rear and SLX front
Shimano M615 hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front & 160mm rear RT54 centerlock rotors
